hero.title: Great Beginnings Day Care
hero.subtitle: Quality childcare for ages 6 weeks to 12 years
hero.description: Nurturing environment with experienced staff, educational programs, and flexible schedules in Roselle, IL

about.title: Welcome to Great Beginnings
about.paragraph1: For over 20 years, we've been providing quality childcare in Roselle, Illinois. Our experienced staff creates a nurturing environment where children can learn, grow, and thrive.
about.paragraph2: We offer flexible schedules, educational programs, and a safe, engaging environment for children from 6 weeks to 12 years old.

featuredPrograms.title: Our Programs
featuredPrograms.subtitle: Age-appropriate care and education tailored to your child's developmental stage

activities.title: Our Daily Activities & Curriculum
activities.subtitle: A comprehensive approach to early childhood education with enriching activities and nutrition

nutrition.title: Nutritious Meals & Snacks
features: Wholesome breakfast, lunch, and afternoon snacks provided daily
Fresh fruit served three times daily for optimal nutrition
Special catering program featuring high-quality, child-friendly meals
Nutritious baby food provided for our youngest learners

curriculum.title: Enriching Curriculum
features: Age-specific curriculum tailored to each classroom's developmental needs
Weekly music enrichment sessions with a professional music educator
Special entertainment programs each week featuring engaging activities children love
Caring, experienced teachers dedicated to nurturing each child's growth

activities.description: Our comprehensive daily program ensures your child receives not only exceptional care but also the educational foundation and enrichment activities that foster creativity, curiosity, and confidence. Every aspect of our curriculum is designed with your child's development and happiness in mind.

nature.title: Where Learning Meets Nature
nature.description: At Great Beginnings, we believe in connecting children with the beauty of the natural world while providing exceptional care and education.

location.title: Visit Us
location.description: Come see our beautiful facility and meet our caring staff

programs.title: Our Programs
programs.subtitle: Age-appropriate care and education for children from 6 weeks to 12 years
programs.detailsSubtitle: Comprehensive information about each of our carefully designed programs

infants.name: Infants
infants.description: Nurturing care for our youngest learners with focus on sensory exploration, motor development, and establishing routines in a safe, loving environment.

toddlers.name: Toddlers
toddlers.description: Encouraging independence and social skills through play-based learning, structured activities, and language development.

twoYearOlds.name: Two Year Olds
twoYearOlds.description: Building foundational skills through hands-on exploration, creative expression, and developing social-emotional awareness.

threeYearOlds.name: Three Year Olds
threeYearOlds.description: Fostering curiosity and learning through age-appropriate curriculum, problem-solving activities, and cooperative play.

fourFiveYearOlds.name: Four/Five Year Olds
fourFiveYearOlds.description: Comprehensive kindergarten preparation with early literacy, math concepts, and developing critical thinking and problem-solving skills.

beforeAfterSchool.name: Before Or After School
beforeAfterSchool.description: Before and after school care with homework support, enrichment activities, and summer camp programs for school-age children.

gallery.title: Photo Gallery
gallery.subtitle: Take a virtual tour of our facility and see where your child will learn and play

cta.title: See Our Facility in Person
cta.description: Photos can only show so much. Schedule a tour to experience our warm, welcoming environment firsthand and meet our dedicated staff.

calendar.title: Calendar & Events
calendar.subtitle: Stay informed about upcoming events, holidays, and closure dates

upcomingEvents.title: Upcoming Events & Closures
upcomingEvents.description: We observe major holidays and close for staff training days. Please plan accordingly.

regularHours.title: Regular Hours
regularHours.notice: Please ensure pickup before 6:00 PM. Late pickup fees apply after closing time.

cta.title: Questions About Our Schedule?
cta.description: Contact us if you have questions about specific dates or need to arrange alternative care during closures.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: We'd love to hear from you! Reach out with questions or schedule a visit.
contact.hoursDetails:
Monday - Friday: 6:00 AM - 6:00 PM
Weekends: Closed

tour.title: Schedule a Tour
tour.subtitle: Experience our facility firsthand and meet our caring, professional staff

whatToExpect.title: What to Expect

duration.title: Duration
duration.description: Tours typically last 30 minutes, giving you plenty of time to see our facility and ask questions.

meetTeam.title: Meet Our Team
meetTeam.description: You'll have the opportunity to meet our experienced teachers and staff, and learn about their qualifications and approach to childcare.

whatToExpect.note: Note: Tours are available Monday through Friday during regular business hours. We recommend scheduling at least 24 hours in advance.

cta.title: Have Questions Before Booking?
cta.description: Feel free to call us or send a message if you'd like to discuss your needs before scheduling a tour.

footer.tagline: Providing quality childcare and education for over 20 years in Roselle, Illinois.
